summary: Alters the appearance of Karliah to better match her voice.
descriptionHtml:
I thought there was always a disconnect between the voice and appearance of Karliah so I decided to fix it.

Besides changing her face, I gave her Vex\'s outfit making it so that she doesn\'t wear a hood. I am using the Thieves Guild Duelist Armor which is why her outfit looks different. If you use the Duelist Armor mod her outfit will look like this. Otherwise she will have her normal outfit, minus the hood.

To Install:
Place the .esp and .bsa into your Skyrim\'s data folder. Check the .esp in the Skyrim launcher.

Required Mods:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Recommended Mods:
Thieves Guild Duelist Armor CBBEv3 Echo (Replacer Version)- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13646/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D13646%26preview%3D&pUp=1
Female Face Retexture by navetsea - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5106
Women of Skyrim Enhanced female normalmaps - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483
ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092
High Quality Eyes by Xenius - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498

My Other Mods:
Better J\'zargo - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35220/
Better Ulfric - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27323
Better Ysolda - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21056
Better Vignar - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20799
Better Carlotta - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21057
Better Olfina - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21024
author: Noobpwnerking
